config.name: get_all_user
config.comment: 查询所有注册用户信息
config.email_body: 查询所有注册用户信息共{}条，见附件
config.sql: select id, username, buy_name, buy_mobile from t_dg_buy_user

config.name: get_daily_new_user
config.comment: 查询每天新注册用户信息
config.email_body: 查询到昨天注册用户信息共{0}条，见附件
config.sql: SELECT t.id, t.username, t.buy_name, t.buy_mobile FROM t_dg_buy_user t, t_dg_invitation_code c WHERE im_token IS NOT NULL AND t.create_date >= DATE_FORMAT('2020-01-23 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%k:%s') AND t.create_date <= DATE_FORMAT('2020-02-29 23:59:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%k:%s') AND t.buy_mobile = c.mobile ORDER BY t.create_date DESC

config.name: get_nonsync_unshelf_products
config.comment: 查询商户系统下架但未在买手后台下架的货源商品
config.email_body: 到目前为至，运营在比柚商户系统有{0}个货源商品已下架但未在买手后台下架，见附件
config.sql: SELECT t.gid AS '商品ID', t.NAME AS '商品名', t.brand_name AS '品牌名', u.currency_type '货币单位', u.wholesale_price AS '批发价', d.pname AS '供应商名称', t.create_date AS '同步买手后台时间', t.update_date AS '买手后台最后更新时间' FROM t_dg_source_goods t, t_ms_product p, t_dg_source_goods_sku u, t_dg_source_provider d WHERE t.shelf = 0 AND t.record_status = 'A' AND t.update_date <= DATE_FORMAT( NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%k:%s' ) AND u.goods_id = t.gid AND p.id = t.relevance_id AND d.pid = t.provider_id AND p.`status` = 3 ORDER BY t.update_date DESC;
